mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Media.NivoSlider
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Displays an image slider on a page using Nivo Silder (http://nivo.dev7studios.com) , a highly customizable plugin for jQuery.
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Displays an image slider on a page using Nivo Silder (http://nivo.dev7studios.com) , a highly customizable plugin for jQuery.
